about_the_game:
Gunrunner Gemma McShay provides the Gang with a new selection of weapons. The mighty SG Versteckt 51D light machine gun, the accurate Pronghorn sniper rifle and the devastating Basilisk 3V grenade launcher, capable of launching deadly gas grenades to deny a large area to the enemy.

The McShay Weapon Pack is also included in the Midland Bundle. Please note that if this DLC is purchased separately, the bundle will become unavailable for purchase.

The McShay Weapon Pack contains the following.
New weapons
    SG Versteckt 51D Light Machine Gun
    • Kalt Barrel
    • Schatten Foregrip
    • Verdunkeln Muzzle Brake
    • Zittern Stock
    Pronghorn Sniper Rifle
    • Quickdraw Speedbolt
    • Longshot Suppressor
    • Stakeout Stock
    • Marksman Stock
    • Standoff Extended Magazine
    Basilisk 3V Grenade Launcher
    • Fang Barrel
    • Serpent
    • Copperhead Recoil Pad
    Viper Grenade
    • Available in paid DLC as ammo for grenade launcher
    • Available for free as hand grenade, locked behind an achievement
    6 New weapon charms
    • Hanging Cactus
    • Cowpoke
    • Lucky Horseshoe
    • Payday Cup
    • Hold ‘Em High
    • Lost Ranger
    2 New exclusive weapon sets
    • Open Range Sniper Mod Set
    • Venomous Mod Set
